cause.description:
Syringomyelia occurs when a cyst forms in the spinal cord, slowly destorying it from the inside out. Symptoms include headaches, pressure pain in the back radiating into the chest, numbness in hands, and eventually paralysis.
If you live in Canada and wish your donation to stay in Canada, visit this web site:
http://www.canadahelps.org/CharityProfilePage.aspx?CharityID=s69442
1. Bring awareness of syringomyelia.
2. Provide support to those diagnosed with syringomyelia.
3. Help researchers find a cure.
cause.name: Knock out syringomyelia
